forum.content:
I'm looking for a partner to go to this movie with me. I already booked the tickets n my partner need not to pay for that. if u wanna join me just add me as friend n tell me u r the one who will go with me:)

我在尋找能和我一起去看索爾3的朋友，票已經買好了，場次再下面的介紹有，無需負擔任何費用，只需人到就好，私訊我吧：）

Theater: 新竹遠百威秀

Time: 19:25
